DOC.brief_summary: This trial will assess the incidence of new and/or undiagnosed diabetic macular edema (DME) in diabetic patients that undergo a DME screening exam. The screening exam will consist of medical history, Electronic ETDRS visual acuity assessment, SD-OCT and color fundus photography
DOC.brief_title: Identifying Patients With Unrecognized Treatable Diabetic Macular Edema
DOC.criteria: Ability to provide written informed consent and comply with study assessments for the full duration of the study Age > 18 years Patient related considerations Patients with diabetes mellitus Disease related considerations Diabetes mellitus Prior admission screening within twelve months. Inability to sit for evaluation
